example: She's got some very interesting things to say on the subject.
You look totally awesome in that dress.
It was a really exciting match.
I found the whole movie fascinating.
The new theatre is going to cost an amazing (= very large)amount of money.
The movie’s special effects are mind-blowing.
The movie was so boring I fell asleep.
We have just received some terrible news.
Looking after the kids is extremely tiring.
The problem is I find most forms of exercise so tedious.
We could just see a dull glow given off by the fire's last embers.
Do you prefer hot or cold weather?
